Header.paragraph: Building an intelligent operating system for enterprise knowledge. We help organizations identify expertise, analyze skill gaps, and dynamically assemble teams based on real-world experience. Currently in active research and development.

About.paragraph: Traize is building an intelligent operating system for enterprise knowledge. Our platform helps organizations identify internal expertise, analyze skill gaps, and dynamically assemble teams based on real-world experience. We make knowledge across departments visible, navigable, and actionable, enabling smarter collaboration, targeted development, and scalable learning systems.
Why: Team formation based on contextual experience

Approach.paragraph: Discover how Traize transforms enterprise knowledge through intelligent systems and data-driven insights.

Services.name: Knowledge Architecture
Services.text: Graph-based systems that map organizational knowledge and expertise relationships at scale.

Services.name: Team Intelligence
Services.text: Dynamic algorithms for optimal team formation based on contextual expertise and collaboration patterns.

Services.name: Research & Development
Services.text: Currently validating models and infrastructure with selected pilot partners in active development phase.

Team.name: Raphael Sauer
Team.description: Raphael drives business strategy and partnerships at Traize. With extensive experience in enterprise sales and strategic partnerships, he focuses on building relationships with pilot partners and scaling our go-to-market approach. His background in business development helps translate our research into real-world enterprise solutions.

Team.name: Lukas Bierling
Team.description: Lukas leads our research initiatives and core engineering architecture. With deep expertise in systems thinking and AI research, he develops the foundational algorithms and infrastructure that power Traize's knowledge mapping capabilities. His work bridges cutting-edge research with scalable engineering solutions.

Team.name: Adrian Henkel
Team.description: Adrian architects and builds the technical infrastructure that makes Traize's vision reality. With strong expertise in distributed systems and data engineering, he ensures our platform can scale to handle enterprise-level knowledge graphs and real-time analytics across large organizations.

Team.name: Theo Rabe
Team.description: Theo shapes the user experience and product design philosophy at Traize. With a focus on making complex knowledge systems intuitive and accessible, he designs interfaces that help users navigate organizational expertise effortlessly. His work ensures our powerful backend capabilities translate into delightful user experiences.

Features.title: Knowledge Discovery
Features.text: Map and discover expertise across your organization, making internal knowledge visible and accessible.

Features.title: Skill Analytics
